SYN_BRONCH_4_7:
[Indication]
Right lower lobe mass.

[Anesthesia]
General.

[Description]
1. Inspection: Endobronchial lesion RLL superior segment.
2. Biopsy: Endobronchial forceps biopsies taken. Hemostasis with epi/cold saline.
3. EBUS: Stations 11L, 10L, 7, 4R, 10R, 11R assessed.
4. Sampling: Station 7 sampled (TBNA x4).

[Plan]
Follow pathology. Notify patient.
